title: Mounts and Other Animals
markdown:
# Mounts and Other Animals
| Item | Carrying Capacity | Cost |
|:---|:---|:---|
| Camel | 450 lb. | 50 GP |
| Elephant | 1,320 lb. | 200 GP |
| Horse, Draft | 540 lb. | 50 GP |
| Horse, Riding | 480 lb. | 75 GP |
| Mastiff | 195 lb. | 25 GP |
| Mule | 420 lb. | 8 GP |
| Pony | 225 lb. | 30 GP |
| Warhorse | 540 lb. | 400 GP |
